text: allahanu dhikkarigaligagi, nuhara patni mattu lutara patniya udaharaneyannu mundittiruvanu; avaribbaru nam'ma ibbaru sajjana dasara adhinadalliddaru. Adare avaru avarannu (tam'ma patiyarannu) vancisidaru. Konege allahaneduru avarinda (tam'ma patiyarinda) avarigeyava labhavu agalilla. ‘‘Narakadolage seri kondavara jote nivu serikolliri’’ endu avarodane helalayitu
